sentences.english: To mark or mottle with spots.
The Brasilia Plateau in November is verdant in comfortable climate.
sentences.chinese: 11月的巴西利亚高原，草木葱茏，气候宜人。

sentences.english: Turning round, I discovered another bright day, trees green and bright.
sentences.chinese: 转过头，又一个夏日铺满眼帘，树木葱茏，阳光明媚。

sentences.english: Here trees are luxuriantly green, green, green grass, quiet elegance.
sentences.chinese: 这里绿树葱茏，碧草如茵，清静幽雅。

sentences.english: The hills are covered with verdure.
sentences.chinese: 山上覆盖着葱茏的草木。

sentences.english: Onions Mau trees along rivers, together constitute a unique scenic.
sentences.chinese: 溪流两岸树木葱茏，构成一道独特的风景线。

sentences.english: Between these ocean-filled valleys, there are wooden peninsulas and islands.
sentences.chinese: 海水灌满的山谷中间，有许多树木葱茏的半岛和岛屿。

definition: verdant/lush green and full of life
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
evergreen pine and cypress (idiom); steadfast nobility
hidden from view/alternately hidden and visible/setting off each other
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
green willow and red flowers/all the colors of spring
